description: Recorded in support of the 1997 album Hourglass, James Taylor's Live At The Beacon Theatre features the legendary singer-songwriter on a spirited journey through his acclaimed catalog. This set features footage not seen in the ori...

original_info.id: James Taylor: Live at the Beacon Theatre_1998
original_info.name: James Taylor: Live at the Beacon Theatre

review.name: My favorite concert
review.reviewBody: This concert DVD is my favorite. The 5.1 sound and the picture quality is great, there are top musicians are and it has many great old and new James Taylor songs. The audience is polite and the music is sweet - this is not a rock concert. If you like James Taylor, this concert DVD is a must-have!
